text:
e="preserve">Lois Cleveland Chiles (born April 15, 1947) is an American actress and former fashion model. She was born in Houston, Texas.
Chiles is known for her roles as Dr. Holly Goodhead in the 1979 James Bond movie "Moonraker", and as a driver in 1987's "Creepshow 2", as well as such movies as "The Great Gatsby", "The Way We Were", "Death on the Nile" and "Broadcast News".
